# <a name="print-email-and-calendars"></a><span data-ttu-id="71c51-102">打印电子邮件和日历</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="71c51-102">Print email and calendars</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="71c51-103">若要打印电子邮件, 请执行以下操作:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="71c51-103">To print an email message:</span></span>
  
1. <span data-ttu-id="71c51-104">选择要打印的邮件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="71c51-104">Select the message you want to print.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="71c51-105">在邮件的右上角, 选择三个点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="71c51-105">At the top right corner of the message, select the three dots</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="71c51-106">, 然后选择</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="71c51-106">and then select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="71c51-107">**打印**。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="71c51-107">**Print**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="71c51-108">若要打印日历, 请执行以下操作:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="71c51-108">To print your calendar:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="71c51-109">在页面的右上角, 选择</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="71c51-109">At the top right corner of the page, select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="71c51-110">**打印**。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="71c51-110">**Print**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="71c51-111">选择 "视图" 和 "时间范围", 然后选择 "**打印**"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="71c51-111">Choose the view and time range, and select **Print**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="71c51-112">了解有关如何[在 Outlook.com 中打印电子邮件和日历的](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy)详细信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="71c51-112">Learn more about how to [print email and calendars in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
